data.name: Producer RabbitMQ
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
    <toD uri="{{protocol}}://{{source}}{{querystring   query_params extra_query_params}}&routingKey={{queue}}&queue={{queue}}&addresses={{hostname}}:{{port}}{{sslProtocol}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
